Introduction
This topic contains special considerations for hospitalization ratings under 38 CFR 4.29, including
awarding a hospitalization rating for
admission of an incarcerated Veteran
, and
multiple SC conditions
, and
considering
mental health treatment programs for hospitalization ratings
, and
treatment provided during a domiciliary stay for hospitalization ratings
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section B - Hospitalization Ratings Under 38 CFR 4.29
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section B
